item.description:
Join us for an evening of jazz with Nick DiMaria at Park Central in Hamden.

After the hectic holidays lets go relax have a drink and listen to some jazz before we let loose at JRoos.


Park Central Tavern,
Executive Chef Robert Johnson has been creating exciting and delightful food since his Culinary Institute of America training in the late ‘70s. Under Rob’s leadership, Park Central’s dynamic weekly menu showcases Chef’s signature entrées as well as classic favorites. These creatively composed dishes, each reflecting the freshest ingredients in New England, offer an addition to our à la carte menu. The dining experience from Park Central’s inception has been an upscale tavern atmosphere with great fresh food.The pricing of our food and drink is designed to meet a reasonable price point for a wide range of clientele.

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: An evening of Jazz @ Park Central
